name: Family Food Fight
description:
It's dinner time! Play an intense food fight with your brothers and sisters and be the last one standing! This is a round-based game. In each round, select your position, as well as shotting angle / force, and press "fire". All the boys and girls will move and shoot at the same time, so good luck guessing where your target will be!

Credits:
